answers.answer: It depends on if your cervix is ready whether even sex would work. Do you know your dilation, effacement, cervix's position and baby's station? Because if you're not thinned or dilated enough, if your cervix is posterior or your baby is super high, even hospital induction is likely to fail.That being said, nipple stimulation, walking, a warm bath (can help relax your cervix), etc can all help.
baby is in position,  but no i don't  know if I'm dilated or not when does the doctor usually check that?
Depends on your Dr but most start checking at thirty six weeks.

Im at 37 weeks as well and also have gestaional diabetes. We're soo close but it seems to be taking forever! If u dont mind me asking, what kind of problems are u having with the gestational diabetes?

question: I'm so close yet so far! these last few weeks are really dragging along.. & even worse i have been having a lot of problems with the gestational diabetes. title: 37 weeks, help??
